column4: I'm trying to convert VOB files from a Sony camcorder to avi, mpg, mp4 (I don't care which) so I can import the files into a video editor. What would be a good set of params for FFMPEG to not loos video quality or audio sync? I can't seem to use mp3 audio, read a little about it but I don't know what to do since the mediabuntu repo is throwing 404s for everything...
avidemux can do that, forget about ffmpeg
Ok I'll give it a shot
just treat the VOB file as an MPEG
